title: A machine learning approach to investigate the impact of land use land cover (LULC) changes on groundwater quality, health risks and ecological risks through GIS and response surface methodology (RSM)
content:
Publication date: August 2024

Source: Journal of Environmental Management, Volume 366

Author(s): Mobarok Hossain, Bettina Wiegand, Arif Reza, Hirok Chaudhuri, Aniruddha Mukhopadhyay, Ankit Yadav, Pulak Kumar Patra
